ProjectTitle: SMILE: cost-utility and impact of high-intensity speech therapy on Speech, MotIvation, and quality of LifE in children with cleft palate
InitialFeedbackHistory:
11/04/2024
Ethics: please add your ethical and privacy approval number(s)
Preservation: onedrive is not very suitable for long term preservation, this is linked to a KU Leuven account and expires when the researcher leaves KU Leuven, have a look at the storage guide (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en) for alternatives, or make sure that all data collected by students/postdocs is transferred to your onedrive 
Sharing: is privacy a factor restricting sharing? If you do decide to share some of your data e.g. when the journal request this, have a look at RDR where you can apply access restrictions to make the metadata open but only give access to the files upon request: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
